definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: dwelling, habitation;—abs. ´[[מ]] Ps 71:3 +, cstr. [[מְעוֹן]] Je 25:30 +, sf. [[מְעוֹנְֶ֑]] Ps 91:9, etc.;—
lair of jackals Je 9:10, Je 10:22, Je 49:33, Je 51:37 (all of desolated cities); [[אֲרָיוֹת]] ´[[מ]] Na 2:12 (‖[[מִרְעֶה]]; fig. of Nineveh).

fig. of ´[[י]] as abode of his people, ´[[חוּר מ]] Ps 71:3, ´[[מ]] alone Ps 90:1, Ps 91:9.—´[[מ]] 1Sa 2:29, 1Sa 2:32 is unintellig. (v. Comm.), poss. rd. [[מְעוֹיֵן]] (eyeing [enviously], v. [[עין]] denom.) Klo HPS, cf. LXX Bu. [[מְעוֹנׇהּ]] Zep 3:7 is difficult in context, LXX We Now rd. [[מֵעֵינֶיה]] (cf. Jos 9:23, 2Sa 3:29).
